name: Ocean of Love
description:
Not Available. Sold to private collection in Spain.

On this great planet lie deep, vast oceans with their cool refreshing waters, their tranquil scenery, and their hidden mysteries. People often go to the seashore to bathe in these waters or gaze upon their beauty. There is another ocean, far greater than the physical waters of this earth. It is an ocean that is far more permanent than the seas. It is an ocean that nourishes the soul. Furthermore, it is the ocean of spiritual consciousness, waiting to be tapped within each of us. It lies within, waiting to be discovered. Furthermore, it is there for everyone who seeks it. The ocean of spiritual consciousness is an ocean of love.

name: Ascending
description:
Not Available. Sold to private collection in Spain.

The dolphins are ascending, as an experience that gives freedom to their soul. Ascension arrives when the soul frees itself from earthly ties and realizes the true joy of life. I wanted to depict an inner rebirth and expansion of the mind, body, and spirit. In other words, the experience of a new being hidden and dwelling within each one of us. An upgrading process that can show a better understanding of ourselves.

This will be one of your masterpieces, those that will always be in the books when you will be talked about as a painter… You can tell that you are transmitting something from above because the words do not explain what it feels like to look at your work... it's like a meditative ecstasy. You live it and when you come back it seems like a dream…
- Nausicaa Vaccaro

name: Leaving the Matrix
description: We can leave the matrix of illusion and the entrapment of samsara instead of becoming enslaved by it. Regardless of how dark it may all seem, there are always ways to find our way towards the light.

name: Just Breathe
description:
Breathe into the power of presence. When the challenges and pressure seem too much to bear, just focus on the breath to feel the peace that is always within you. Anchor yourself on the breath to calm your emotions and your worries. Just breathe.

Acrylic on Canvas / 80 × 40 cm.

name: There is Always an Opportunity
description: Everybody has a second opportunity, no matter what you may have done in the past or how unfit you feel. There is always a window of opportunity open for those that are able to question themselves and change to a more wholesome direction.

name: Going With the Flow
description:
What does “going with the flow mean”? The origin dates back to the Roman Emperor Marcus Aurelius. He apparently encouraged people not to waste energy and fight against what you cannot change, but rather to accept things as they are instead of fighting against them and wishing things were different.

This turtle represents the epitome of going with the flow.

name: Don't Worry be Happy
description: Trouble and challenges in everyone’s life are guaranteed, but by worrying it only becomes worse. Society frowns upon people who do not appear to worry about their lives’ problems and often deem such people as detached or foolish. It could not be further from the truth. When we stop worrying about the future and imagining worst case scenarios in our head, then we can enjoy the present moment like this betta fish. Only then, we can dance happily in the now.

name: Floating Away
description: When we are able to let go of the worry, let it float away like a weightless jellyfish, we free ourselves from further burden and open the door to all that is right for us.

name: Planetary Ascension
description:
SOLD TO PRIVATE COLLECTOR IN BELGIUM.

The ultimate goal for our planet at this time is to attain a higher vibratory frequency so we can activate the energy of "Mass Planetary Ascension." When this occurs, a very high vibrational crystalline energy will be released and integrated into the grid systems of the Earth. This energy is the energy of oneness and unconditional love.

Those of us who choose service to others over service to self will be able to walk up this amazing starway of enlightenment.

name: Kundalini Rising
description:
Donated to charity initiative in Spain.

There are many practices (yoga, dance, mantras, meditation…) to activate the energy at the base of our spine and channel it up through the chakra centers,  aiming at  a full-body Kundalini awakening. I wanted to depict here what those energy centers could look like.

name: An Angel Showed Up
description:
No matter how hard life may seem and how tough our personal challenges are, an angel is always by our side willing to help and support us in our earthly predicaments.
What a wonder Monica! I love angels, I feel that they always accompany and protect us... your work moves me very much and makes me climb to the sky in a spiral of love and light.

It's like traveling the night in the starry sky... everything is silence, peacefulness...
- Nausicaa Vaccaro

name: Angel's Touch
description:
What would it be like to touch the energy of an angel? What would it be like to see one with the naked eye? This is what angels look like to me when I see them with my inner vision. 
This one makes me dizzy. Metamorphosis. I feel like I'm dying and it's a beautiful moment. I transform into a butterfly and the circle of life holds me. Everything is aerial and light, I feel God's hand through the ring and blurred sound of angel wings around. Orchid perfume pervade me. Flight between silk curtains... It's amazing because all the senses are involved...

Nausicaa Vaccaro

name: Samadhi
description:
Sold to private collector in Spain.

Samadhi is the highest state of consciousness that a human can reach in life. It is the goal of our spiritual journey on Earth, the blissful return to our Divine origin. I find it very difficult to describe the consciousness of Samadhi, so I prefer to paint the vibration. Can you feel it?

Samadhi is a Sanskrit word for the highest state of consciousness one can achieve through meditation. Having practiced meditation for more than 20 years (and taught Mindfulness for a long time too) has allowed me to experience a lasting peace and inner silence that allows me to connect to the Source from which I get the inspiration to create my artworks.

So how do you depict Samadhi? Through a non-representational painting that allows you to experience the fire, the expansion and the deep emptiness of Unity.

name: Divine DNA
description:
Just as we carry physical DNA that shapes us across generations, we also carry an energetic code or spiritual DNA that links us back to the very source of our origins, the Prime Creator.  This power is within us all. We can transmute any negativity and overcome any limitation. We are creator beings.

Acrylic on Canvas / 100 × 50 cm.

name: Mantra of Compassion
description: Oṃ maṇi padme hung is a Sanskrit mantra that could be translated to the "jewel in the lotus”. It shows the lotus ability to emerge unstained from the mud, and a metaphor of spiritual awakening. This work is my Western version of it.

name: The Wheel of Samsara
description:
This painting depicts how we become trapped in a counterproductive maelstrom of suffering and how this process can be reversed, showing how Buddhists place themselves in an ever changing universe of cause and effect. By illuminating the causes behind our situation of limitation and pain, the wheel of cyclic existence reveals how, through practicing antidotes to these causes, we can overcome the painful and limiting situations that are their effects. 
It shows the altruistic purpose that can make life meaningful.

name: Inner Bliss
description: Inner bliss is a soul soothing and mind-resting place where you can be yourself and let it go of all worries and annoyances. It is a place where you can restore and get centered. It is where you can find deep healing, peace and harmony. And this place is actually within!

name: A New Dawn for Humanity
description: The world’s conditions seem to worsen with every passing day. People are in pain, and things look bleak. However, many of us know that humanity is experiencing increasingly severe labor pains as we also give birth to a new, evolved world. This girl represents all of those who can already see the positive signs…

name: Connection
description:
Daily life is full of noise, and that impacts us negatively. When your attention goes to the chaos around, your best intentions are undermined.
The key is learning to sustain the connection with the source of guidance that lies within you. When you do that, you live in an ocean of peace, regardless of what is going on around you.

name: Faith
description:
There are always moments of uncertainty and hardship in everybody’s lives. Having faith means that somehow we know, we have the confidence that we will make it. Faith speaks the language of the heart. It is an expression of hope that goes beyond the conscious mind and any belief. 
Faith is knowing something deep inside that cannot be perceived with the physical eyes, and carry us forward.

name: Follow Your Path
description: You will recognize your own path when you come upon it, because you will feel full of energy, joy and gratitude. No matter how accidental or difficult your life may have seemed until then, it all led you to your Destiny.

name: Hope
description:
Hope is the one thing that can help us get through the darkest of times. Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness. It is what tells us that we will get through the storm and witness better circumstances.
Remember, there is a crack in everything. That’s how the light gets in.

name: Inner Fire
description: Our inner light is an expression of our true essence. It is the subtle, pure energy that is the core of our being. When we succumb to negative feelings, thoughts and beliefs, when we get involved in drama and discord, we dim our light, and we drown in a sea of darkness. When we become aware and feed the positive and wholesome, we shine.

name: Let the Storm Go By
description: All storms —no matter how big and terrible they are— come and go. By keeping the faith you will overcome all the struggles, setbacks and obstacles. This current storm shall also pass. Just watch it as a witness without being dragged by it.

name: Blessings
description:
There are many blessings all around you. The world is full of beauty, and choosing to embrace your blessings will allow you to see all the good that you have been given.

Being thankful for the gifts in your life. Count your blessings. Once you realize how valuable you are and how much you have going for you, the smiles will return, the sun will break out, the music will play, and you will finally be able to move forward with grace.

name: Welcome Home
description: We all go through many ups and downs, tests and challenges in this life. Sometimes it gets really tough and disheartening. That is why it is encouraging to know that at some point we will all go Home into the light, which is indeed our true essence.

name: Life’s Meandering
description:
As the great philosopher Soren Kierkegaard used to say: “Life can only be understood by looking backward; but it must be lived looking forward”. Why is it so? Because our existence is never a straightforward path, but one full of meanderings, twists and turns. 

Trust that as long as you live aligned with your highest values, you will end up somewhere good. It also entails choosing to enjoy each step of this unpredictable journey and filling it with meaning.

name: The Path of Healing
description:
SOLD TO A PRIVATE COLLECTOR IN SPAIN

When we suffer, we have two choices: to try to heal our painful emotions or numb ourselves, so we do not feel anything.

No matter how many turns it takes, and how difficult it may be at times, only the path of healing leads to serenity and happiness in the end.

name: Timeless
description:
The timeless in you is aware of life's timelessness. And knows that yesterday is but today's memory and tomorrow is today's dream. That is the only thing real.

All that is not eternal is eternally out of date.

name: Soothing Your Heart
description:
When your heart is heavy, and the corrosive strains and stress of modern life wear you down, find that inner place that soothes you and washes away all your troubles.

Let those soothing surroundings change your mood and calm your emotions.

name: New Beginning
description:
Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over. 

There will come a time when you believe everything is finished; that will be the beginning. Feel the freshness of that possibility and let yourself float in that space.

name: Magic Exists
description:
Magic exists. Who can doubt it, when there are rainbows and wildflowers, dolphins in the ocean and oaks growing out of acorns? When you are able to listen to the voice of silence and being touched by the smile of another, you know that it is real. 

It is such a natural and extraordinary part of our lives.

name: Devotion
description: Devotion is that kind of inspiration and confidence that supports you through the cloudy times in life. It is that sort of faith that keeps you going because you know things are never as dark as they appear to be, and there is a purpose in everything.

name: Beyond Your Dreams
description: We often feel impotent and incapable of having real impact. We think we have to settle for less and to bow to the powers that be. Nothing could be further from the truth. We are divine beings, and we are creators. We are able to go beyond our dreams.

name: Into the Light
description:
Acrylic / 60 × 60 cm.

Artwork sold. Not available.

name: Into the Unknown
description:
Acrylic / 60 × 60 cm.

Artwork sold. Not Available.

name: The Path to Liberation
description: It is so easy to become distracted by our daily chores and trivial activities. However, by holding our unwavering goal of liberation we will always find our own path towards enlightenment.

name: Protection
description:
Like in Star Wars, we can create a protection bubble, or a bubble of safety, to stay in your own power, regardless of what is going on around you. This is an ability we all have as we are made of energy.
This artwork transmits an infinite peace, also because of the range of tones chosen. It conveys hope and is an inspiration to get out of our little world, to be aware that we walk in a perfect and wonderful Cosmos, with multiple energies in balance. Step after step we return home...
- Nausicaa Vaccaro

name: Life is a Stairway
description:
Life is a stairway ever pulling up. Many wonderful things await up there. The climb is constant, so many give up along the way. The crucial thing is to never lose sight of the light that is our final destination somewhere in the cosmos.
This painting is extremely complex: when I look at it I feel that I am in the eye of God, guided by his light and wisdom. At the same time I am the eye that observes and protects, it is my eye that penetrates reality and connects me with the deepest part of my being. It is a work that ends up dissolving the dualism between the Creator and the creation, establishing the unity of the whole. A work of the fifth dimension…
- Nausicaa Vaccaro

name: Entrance
description:
Most people request: “Give me a light that I may tread safely into the unknown”, not realizing that the entrance to that place where they long to be is right here, right now.
It may take a leap of faith to step in and go over the threshold, but that is where the lesson lies.

name: Moving Forward
description:
Even in the darkness, light is coming. 
Even in the midst of the storm, a calmness is coming. 
Even in the midst of brokenness, restoration is possible. 

Just keep on walking, do not bother to look back. Just look straight ahead. The future is brighter than you may think, if you just dare to let go of the past and move forward towards the light.

name: Fiery Gate
description: Let’s face it, following our aspirations and dreams requires traveling into uncharted territories. More often than not, it seems that following our star is like going through a fiery threshold; we do not know what awaits on the other end. We need a lot of courage to row alone, daring to take risks to be ourselves no matter what.

name: Medieval Gate
description: In Europe during late Middle Ages, the church’s doctrine made life very difficult for women healers. Most of these women treated patients with medicines made from plants and what was considered magic. Unfortunately, fear of the female power made them a target, and many women who practiced the healing arts during the Middle Ages came to tragic ends. They were condemned as witches and burned at the stake. This is a homage to them.

name: Stargate
description:
Portals are technological doorways that connect two separate locations in space and/or time. They usually consist of at least two connected gateways which can establish communication with one another, and transfer matter from one to the other.
This is my vision of a Stargate, which allows us to attune to many worlds throughout the galaxy and beyond.

name: Wormhole of Time
description:
A wormhole is a hole in the space-time curve. This hole connects two points in the space which are far apart. A wormhole is also a path which connects between two parallel universes.

Where are we now? Where is here? Could here simultaneously be somewhere else? There is no reason why we should not consider the “in here” as an infinite potential of wormholes to other dimensions, and to other perspectives in spacetime.

As we awake in consciousness, we realize that we are not bound by our physical limitations and we can basically be in different places and different times simultaneously.

name: A Fresh Perspective
description:
If you are stuck, a fresh perspective may be just what you need to become unstuck. Getting attached to your usual ways and beliefs can trap you in a very limited box. Sometimes, all it takes is the willingness to question and the openness of mind to actively seek out fresh perspectives to further develop your vision. 

It can lead you to a wonderful world that is just a thought away.

name: Leaving Darkness Behind
description:
When the night seems endless, and the light is just a faraway promise, we think we are forever trapped. Yet, we can forward out of darkness, and leave the night behind.
There is a gate out of the darkness, leaving all our ghosts and wounds behind. 
There is a promising land on the other side. Be hopeful. Be brave.

name: The Test
description:
An inevitable truth of life is that you are guaranteed to be tested. Life’s tests come in many different forms and fashions: physical tests, mental tests, emotional tests, spiritual tests… Tests are opportunities given from the universe to help you become stronger, and ascend to the next level of existence. 
Tests are life’s way of promoting you to the next level of being. Are you ready to evolve to the next level?

name: Dressed for Joy
description: We can choose how feel every day, depending on where we focus our mind on. We can decide to focus on the positive or on the negative. That is how we dress every day. I hope you always choose to dress for joy!

name: Flower of Life - Day
description: The Flower of Life symbolizes creation and reminds us of the unity of everything: we are all built from the same blueprint. This the version during the day.

name: Flower of Life - Night
description: The Flower of Life symbolizes creation and reminds us of the unity of everything: we are all built from the same blueprint. This the version during the night.

name: Central Sun
description:
Sold to private collection in Barcelona, Spain

The Central Sun is the mysterious spiritual Being in the center of our cosmos and from which the physical sun emanated. It can be equated with the Prime Creator. I tried to portray this incredibly spiritual field

What to say about this capolaboro (masterpiece)? I want to lose myself in this creative source and get out of the dual mind, surrendering myself. What a dream! My soul gets so moved...

This work transmits strength, passion, creativity, firmness and wisdom. It looks like an eye that contains everything and that pours life at the same time that it is capable of containing it all. Majestic.
- Nausicaa Vaccaro, Philosopher

name: Infinity
description:
Not available. Sold to private collection in Spain.
Acrylic on Canvas / 150 × 50 cm.

name: Nebula
description: Nebulae are made up of dust, basic elements such as hydrogen and other ionized gases. I have always found them to be fascinating with their richness of color, form and scorching ultraviolet radiation. So this is what I imagine this fantasy landscape to be in the far away sky.

name: Outer Space
description:
Not available. Sold to private collection in the US.

This is where stars are born and supernovas die, where galaxies are created and the universe continues the never ending expansion…

name: Unconditional Love
description:
Sold to private collector in Spain.
Unconditional love is the most embracing and liberating sensation you will ever experience. It is the most healing force in the universe. It is the force that holds the cosmos together and gives life to all that is. I tried to depict this breathtaking power in this work.

name: We Are Stardust
description:
Sold to private collector in Spain.

We are part of this universe, and the universe is in us. We are actually deeply connected with the universe itself, which exists within us.

name: Your Inner Light
description:
Sold to private collector in Spain.

All too often we are absorbed by our own dramas and worries. We are so identified with our roles and carried away by our problemas that we forget our true essence, our inner light. Let’s cultivate this inner light so we can radiate it in a world that sorely needs everybody’s light shinning.

name: The Eye of The Universe
description: Everything we think, say and do is recorded in the Akashic records. Everything leaves a trace behind. Cause and effects are direct albeit not always immediate. By becoming responsible and watchful of our own behavior, we can make sure we only create wholesome waves that can affect our future as well as the collective.

name: Divine Big Bang
description: It all started here. Life itself came to manifest from being an idea in the mind of the Prime Creator to being the adventure of becoming. The voyage into separation started and the voyage of self-discovery as well.

name: Universal Spiral
description: The spiral is the rhythm of life. It characterizes the creative vital force of the universe. It is also a symbol of unity of sentient beings, as well as the spiritual and moral growth of humans. Furthermore, it expresses the life order, the symbol of continuity, development, motion, and journey into the unknown.

name: Guiding Star
description:
Sold to private collection in Barcelona, Spain.

Far away from the lights of the city, we can observe a sky powdered with stars. When we watch this celestial splendor, we can feel how eternity speaks to us. Sometimes, it is only by searching an anchorage in an uncertain universe that we can feel an overwhelming connection to our guiding star.

name: Consciousness Eye
description:
Trying to subtract the universe components in order to reduce it to its essential underlying elements, I realized that the essence that remains is pure consciousness. That is the natural transcendental state of everything that exists, which also is the underlying component to eternity.

This is what I intended to depict in this painting.

name: A Galaxy is Born
description:
Every minute, galaxies are born. Why and how remains a mystery to human beings. Yet, we are fascinated by the great variety of galaxy shapes and sizes that make up the universe as we see it today. We are puzzled by the continuous expansion of space and the ultimate fate of the universe. There is much to discover…
This is how I visualize the birth of a galaxy.

name: May Your Dreams Come true
description: If you have a dream, then just believe that you can achieve it no matter what. Even when you can't feel deep in your heart any words of encouragement, just believe in your dream and your heart will finally show you the way.

name: The Three Suns
description:
This painting is inspired by a crop circle. The Sun, or Helios, is a symbol of God's force, referring to the eternal powers or archetypal principles of Creation: the symbolic aspects that combine with all into The One.

Besides, 3 is a sacred number. Pythagoras postulated that the number 3 was considered as the perfect number, the number of harmony, wisdom and understanding. It is also the number of time: past, present, future; birth, life, death; beginning, middle, end. It is the number of the divine.

name: Trust The Process
description:
Trust is the process of allowing what IS, to be what it IS.
It means letting go of control and expectations. It means being relaxed enough at any moment to take effective action when needed or do nothing when that is most helpful. Trust is an awareness that there is no need for anxiety about whatever happens because it is all part of the journey of life.
Trusting the process means that no matter what comes along, the process will teach you what you need to learn if you are willing to listen, pause, and believe something good will come out of the chaos.

name: Courage
description:
There are many occasions when we face the unknown, or even difficult circumstances, and we need courage to overcome our fears.
At those times, it is important to look within and find the fire that lights your path. Sure, the path may be scary and unknown, but with a little courage and a strong belief in yourself, it can take you to incredible places.
Remember, life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.

name: From the Cosmos to Nature
description: I tried to depict the link between the Macrocosm and  the Microcosm, how the small order of nature on this planet is a reflection of the cosmos as a whole. Everything sprouts from the Cosmic Mind in a seamless process the human mind can only imagine but never fully understand.

name: The Presence of the Infinite
description:
Our transcendent potential is found by the deepening realization of the essentially spiritual qualities of beauty, truth, and goodness.
Beyond duality, limitations and shallow concerns lies our connection to the Infinite. There we can start experiencing and discovering glimpses of the mystery of who we really are.

name: The End of the World
description: Funny as it may seem, it is only when we approach the end of the world that we can see it is the beginning of a new path. Millions of possibilities lay ahead. Sometimes we have to go to the very edge to discover those possibilities. Be an adventurer and you will be rewarded.

name: Free
description:
Not available. Sold to private collection in Spain. 
Acrylic dyptich / 90 × 30 cm. each

When I look at it I am already one of those birds of light... it absorbs me into a kind of contemplative meditation
- Nausicaa Vaccaro
